title: [WORK] Ep. 53: How To Grow Your Visibility, Profits + Influence by Chelsea Krost
description:
Do you feel overwhelmed with social media marketing platforms?

Listen in this week as Ash interviews Chelsea Krost, an author, speaker and wildly successful strategist for marketing in the modern world.  She is someone who has been a major influencer in driving the evolution of internet marketing with millennials.  Chelsea deeply discusses the 5 stages to impact and build a brand.  If you think Marketing brand vision is just for the entrepreneur, think again!  Chelsea and Ash discuss how to position a personal brand for job seekers and growing your position as a leader in a niche corporate career.  If you are looking to generate an authentic audience or grow your influence, Chelsea suggests 1 ninja thing to do for 60 minutes every day.  Don’t forget to stay around for Ash’s post-episode notes!

Resources:

www.chelseakrost.com

 

Want to launch your dream business? Visit Youturnpodcast.com/biz
